alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 05 at 11:17PM PST until December 06 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Siskiyou County. This includes the Shasta valley south of Montague, including the city of Weed. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
